description.value: You gain a +1 enhancement bonus to one physical ability score (Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution) (select which ability increases from the "Changes" tab of this window). This bonus increases by +1 for every five wizard levels you possess to a maximum of +5 at 20th level. You can change this bonus to a new ability score when you prepare spells. At 20th level, this bonus applies to two physical ability scores of your choice.
